scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:extensions
scripts.build:extensions: npm run build:extensions:docker && npm run build:extensions:lima && npm run build:extensions:crc && npm run build:extensions:podman
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --dir --config.asar=false
scripts.compile:next: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --publish always --config .electron-builder.config.js
scripts.compile:pull-request: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --publish never --config .electron-builder.config.js
scripts.compile:current: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js
scripts.test: npm run test:main && npm run test:preload && npm run test:renderer && npm run test:e2e
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:main && npm run typecheck:preload && npm run typecheck:renderer
scripts.website:build: cd website && yarn run docusaurus build

resolutionsComments.ssh2: Need to use an old version of ssh2 to avoid vite/rollup issue on loading some internal lib
